name: Seven Years' War
desc: Maria Theresa forms alliance with France and Russia to retake Silesia. New World conflicts between France and Great Britain.

name: Thirty Years' War
desc: Series of religious and political conflicts between Catholic and Protestants and Bourbons and Habsburgs.

name: War of Austrian Succession
desc: Frederick II invades the province of Austrian province of Silesia.

name: War of Spanish Succession
desc: The Grand Alliance fights Spain and France to prevent the unification of the Spanish and French crowns.
